description:
Screen, webcam and sketchboard recorder with an integrated editor.

This tool allows you to record a selected area of your screen, live feed from your webcam or live drawings from a sketchboard. Afterward, you can edit and save the animation as a GIF, APNG, video, PSD or PNG image.
What's new?
- Update Chinese localization by @nkh0472 in #1313
- Updated Turkish localization by @gurkantuna in #1314
- Arabic and Dutch localizations also updated.
Fixed:
- Fix for Move Left/Right commands.
- Fix for the second extra color button by @pawlos in #1297
- Fix typo in stop recording message (PT-BR) by @AlissonSteffens in #1298
